viewmodel.title: View Model

viewmodel.category.general.rotY.desc: The rotation of objects on the Y axis
viewmodel.category.general.rotZ.desc: The rotation of objects on the Z axis
viewmodel.category.arm.enable.desc: Enable or disable affect on Arm

viewmodel.category.arm.posArmY.desc: The position of arm on the Y axis
viewmodel.category.arm.posArmZ.desc: The position of arm on the Z axis
viewmodel.category.arm.rotArmX.desc: The rotation of arn on the X axis
viewmodel.category.arm.rotArmY.desc: The rotation of arm on the Y axis
viewmodel.category.arm.rotArmZ.desc: The rotation of arm on the Z axis
viewmodel.category.swinganimation.enable: Enable or disable the swing animations
viewmodel.category.swinganimation.slowEn: Enable or disable the slow animations
